name: phonebook-api
description: REST API for the fullstackopen course phonebook application

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part-02/03-phonebook-app/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../part-03/02-phonebook-api
scripts.deploy: cd ../../ && git subtree push --prefix part-03/02-phonebook-api heroku-phonebook-api main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m 'UI build' && git push origin main && npm run deploy

author: Luis Guzman
